resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/74048</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>74048</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>4124b118-bd84-405e-2164-da61023eaf00#1#7</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A sumer művészet</string>
            <string language="en">sumer art</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">sumer kunst</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">art de sumer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">arte do sumer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">arte del sumer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">sumer τέχνη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">arte del sumer</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A sumer művészet bemutatása. A korszak jelentős építészeti, szobrászati emlékeinek valamint domborműveinek ismertetése</string>
            <string language="en">Presentation of sumer art. Expounding the important memories of architecture, sclupture and embossment of the era.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">kerámia,  neolitikus,  Ubaid,  Uruk,  városok, sumer,  Ur,  dombormű,  </string>
            <string language="en">ceramic, neolitic, Ubaid, Uruk, cities, sumer, Úr, embossment</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Darstellung der sumer kunst. Erklären der 
wichtigen Speicher der Architektur, des sclupture und der Prägung von
der Ära.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Présentation d'art de sumer. Exposition des
mémoires importantes de l'architecture, du sclupture et du foulage de
l'ère.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Apresentação da arte do sumer. Expounding 
as memórias importantes da arquitetura, do sclupture e do embossment 
da era.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Presentazione di arte del sumer. Esposizione
delle memorie importanti di architettura, dello sclupture e del 
embossment dell'era.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παρουσίαση του αρθ. sumer που αναπτύσσει τις 
σημαντικές μνήμες της αρχιτεκτονικής, του sclupture και 
embossment της εποχής.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Presentación del arte del sumer. Exponer 
las memorias importantes de la configuración, del sclupture y del 
repujado de la era.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">keramisch, neolitic, Ubaid, Uruk, Städte, sumer, Úr, Prägung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">en céramique, neolitic, Ubaid, Uruk, villes, sumer, Úr, 
foulage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">cerâmico, neolitic, Ubaid, Uruk, cidades, sumer, Úr, 
embossment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">di ceramica, neolitic, Ubaid, Uruk, città, sumer, Úr, 
embossment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κεραμικός, neolitic, Ubaid, Uruk, πόλεις, sumer, 
Ϊr, embossment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">de cerámica, neolitic, Ubaid, Uruk, ciudades, sumer, Úr, 
repujado</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-T-LRE">11-13</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>presentation</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn:
org:Kossuth Kiadó Rt.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>591</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>74048</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://sdt.sulinet.hu/Player/default.aspx?g=4124b118-bd84-405e-2164-da61023eaf00&v=1&b=7</uri>

    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
